import React, { Component } from 'react' // import { connect } from 'react-redux' // import { deleteToddlers } from '../../actions/toddlerActions' class ToddlerFilter extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props.toddler, "Toddler Filter") console.log(this.props.toddlerId, "Toddler Filter") let toddler = this.props.toddler let toddlerId = this.props.toddlerId const handleDelete = (event, toddler) => { this.props.delete(toddler.id) } return (

Name Birthday Emergency Contact Phone Allergy
{toddler.name} {toddler.birthday} {toddler.contact} {toddler.phone} {toddler.allergy}
handleDelete(toddler)}/>
) } } export default ToddlerFilter
